snippet: The insurance giant American International Group is looking to raise $6 billion by reducing its stake in its Asian insurance unit, part of a broader effort to repay the federal government
abstract: The insurance giant American International Group is looking to raise $6 billion by reducing its stake in its Asian insurance unit, part of a broader effort to repay the federal government

headline.main: A.I.G. to Raise $6 Billion to Repay Government Bailout
